DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study is to assess the effect of a high intake of industrially produced trans fatty acids for 16 weeks on abdominal obesity and risk markers of type 2 diabetes and heart disease in healthy, moderately overweight, postmenopausal women.
DOC.criteria: Age 4570 years BMI 2532 Waist circumference > 80 cm Postmenopausal for at least 1 year BP > 160/100 mmHg Fasted blood glucose > 7 mM Fasted LDLcholesterol > 6 mM Fasted triglycerides > 3 mM Diabetes mellitus or other chronic diseases Current or previous cardiovascular disease Weight change > 3 kg within last 2 months Use of antihypertensive drugs Use of statins/fibrates Use of fish oil supplements Smoking Hard physical activity > 10 h/week
